author: slava77
body:
- mostly technical pattern simplification: simplify dir matching patterns with currently necessary map disambiguation
- style fix for shorthand naming of 10805 nano workflow
- also, a bugfix in map for 20411.0 (wrong mapping)

to support updates made in cms-sw/cmssw#30988
the update map should still work on past releases
title: reco comparisons: cleanup/simplify mapping patterns for shorthand workflow maps
